key_events: Artie is introduced as a cynical office drone carrying a LARP prop (Rusty Shortsword).
A bag of 'Nacho Average Jalapeño' chips gets stuck in the Snack-O-Matic 3000.
Artie attempts to shake the machine and reach into the bin for the chips.
The Rusty Shortsword conducts a fatal electrical surge from a frayed wire into Artie.
Artie dies and his consciousness enters the System Void.
The System mocks Artie's 'Stupidity-Induced Electrical Discharge' and begins character creation.
Fizz introduced herself as the legally mandated System Guide.
Artie attempted to allocate 80 points into Vitality to become a 'tank'.
Residual electricity from the Snack-O-Matic caused a UI malfunction.
All 100 stat points were forced into Critical Probability and Multiplier.
The System assigned the 'Glass Cannon' trait and set Artie's HP to 1/1.
The System Void dissolved, beginning Artie's transport to the game world.
Artie materializes in the Tutorial Zone and triggers a 'Kinetic Impact' warning upon landing.
The System confirms Artie's 1/1 HP status and warns that a 'Tutorial Grace Period' saved him from impact damage.
Fizz appears and mocks Artie's fragility, confirming he is a 'Glass Cannon'.
A Level 1 Lesser Forest Slime (10 HP) emerges and targets Artie.
Artie realizes that the slime's 2 attack power is lethal to him and attempts to flee.
Artie nearly dies from tripping on a tree root, highlighting the danger of environmental hazards.
Artie is backed against an oak tree with the slime preparing to lunge.
Artie missed five consecutive attacks against a Level 1 slime due to erratic hit detection.
Artie realized his 100% Crit Rate is a system law that eventually forces a hit regardless of 'Prop' weapon status.
Artie landed a 'SUPER-MEGA-ULTRA-CRIT' dealing 9,999,999 damage to a 10 HP enemy.
The impact vaporized the slime and completely destroyed a massive oak tree, leaving a glassed crater.
Artie reached Level 2 and gained 5 unallocated stat points.
The System issued a formal warning regarding environmental destruction and 'Ash-Related' janitorial tickets.
Artie acquired the 'Participation Trophy (Tutorial Edition)' (Rare/Cursed).
The trophy's 'Aggro Aura' activated, attracting Level 4 Mangy Coyotes and slimes.
Artie maintained his 1 HP build by refusing to allocate points into Vitality.
Artie began a desperate sprint toward the Tutorial Zone exit to suppress the Aggro Aura.
Artie arrived at the Oakhaven gates while fleeing a Level 5 Mangy Coyote lured by his trophy.
Guards Hovis and Barnaby were observed betting on Artie's stats as he approached the scanner.
The gate scanner triggered a loud 'Statistical Anomaly' alarm, publicly displaying Artie's 1 HP and 100% Crit stats.
Artie 'critted the air' with his prop sword, creating a localized vacuum that saved him from the coyote's lunge.
Guards Hovis and Barnaby killed the coyote and issued Artie an Anomaly ID Tag.
Artie entered Oakhaven with the 'Mark of Shame' (Anomaly Tag) and learned the town's respawn shrine is under renovation.
Artie entered the Gilded Tankard while carrying the Participation Trophy (Tutorial Edition) in his left hand.
The trophy's Aggro Aura attracted a Level 1 Tavern Rat, which Artie killed with a 999-damage critical hit.
Mayor Whitlock explained the Crit-Economy, where Essence Shards are minted from the 'Excessive Force' of critical hits.
The Mayor attempted to recruit Artie as a 'Crit-Battery' to generate wealth in a secure vault.
Artie refused to allocate his 5 unspent stat points despite the Mayor's pressure.
Artie fled the Gilded Tankard to avoid being scouted as a political and economic resource.
milestone: crit_economy_revealed = DONE
Vane challenged Artie to a Friendly Duel with a 100 Gold stake.
Artie used the 'Prop' tag on his sword to trigger a System Warning and invalidate the duel.
The Participation Trophy's Aggro Aura summoned a swarm of Level 4 Alley Rats.
Artie discarded the Participation Trophy (Tutorial Edition) to distract Vane and facilitate his escape.
The System initiated the 'Vane Vendetta' thread following Artie's escape.
Artie reached safety in the backstreets with 5 Stamina remaining.
must_stay_true: status: CHAR_ARTIE -> 100% Critical Hit Rate (hard constraint)
inventory: CHAR_ARTIE -> Participation Trophy (Tutorial Edition) (carried, hand_left)
trait: Aggro Aura (active on Participation Trophy)
inventory: CHAR_ARTIE -> Anomaly ID Tag (stowed, container=pockets)
